channel.title: Need help getting server online ZMOGZ MNA HWO 2 DOO DIS?!111shift+1?///
channel.description: okie pokie dokie mokie smokie I got a 508 spawn pking server thing I think its based off batscape or somethin..idk anyway the source doesnt have any ip but the client does... i made a copy of the client, 1 for me and the other is the player client the one for me i set all the ips to 127.0.0.1 and the player client is pvplogics.no-ip.biz well i uploaded the playerclient and asked my friend to try it out, but he cant connect to me I used the tutorial of setting up and rsps without a router; pretty much i got the no-ip all set up, and the utorrent set up to port 43594 im not sure if this affects my hosting capabilities but im hosting from a dorm with typical school restrictions but i have my utorrent port open and crap with the clients port, my no-ip and everything set up like the tut said the source doesnt have an ip or anything, all i do is run the source and it works for me when i run the 127.0.0.1 client but when other players run the pvplogics.no-ip.biz client they cant connect althought no-ip is up and running

item.title: Need help getting server online ZMOGZ MNA HWO 2 DOO DIS?!111shift+1?///
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

you have to type in that local ip into your web browser. That should bring up your router information. From there you can set up portforward.

What ip does whatismyip.com give you? Remember it has to be your LAN ip. You could go to status on your router information (through the browser) and look for LAN ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting server online ZMOGZ MNA HWO 2 DOO DIS?!111shift+1?///

item.title: Need help getting server online ZMOGZ MNA HWO 2 DOO DIS?!111shift+1?///
item.dc:creator: @mrcrispypwn mrcrispypwn
item.description:
@mrcrispypwn wrote:

Don’t use uTorrent. Go to 192.168.1.1 or whatever your default gateway is and portforward 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Need help getting server online ZMOGZ MNA HWO 2 DOO DIS?!111shift+1?///
item.dc:creator: @l2spel l2spel
item.description:
@l2spel wrote:

okie pokie dokie mokie smokie
I got a 508 spawn pking server thing I think its based off batscape or somethin…idk
anyway the source doesnt have any ip but the client does…
i made a copy of the client, 1 for me and the other is the player client
the one for me i set all the ips to 127.0.0.1 and the player client is pvplogics.no-ip.biz
well i uploaded the playerclient and asked my friend to try it out, but he cant connect to me
I used the tutorial of setting up and rsps without a router; pretty much i got the no-ip all set up, and the utorrent set up to port 43594
im not sure if this affects my hosting capabilities but im hosting from a dorm with typical school restrictions
but i have my utorrent port open and crap with the clients port, my no-ip and everything set up like the tut said
the source doesnt have an ip or anything, all i do is run the source and it works for me when i run the 127.0.0.1 client
but when other players run the pvplogics.no-ip.biz client they cant connect althought no-ip is up and running

Read full topic
